## validAntMoves() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get all valid moves for the tile at the given coordinate acting as an ant.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function validAntMoves(board: GameBoard, coordinate: HexCoordinate): HexCoordinate[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The location of the tile acting as an ant.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of hex coordinates.

## Remarks

The ant rules state that an ant can move to any other position around the hive as long as it can slide to that location.
